intro: Ophiorrhiza grandibracteolata, commonly known as the large-bract Ophiorrhiza, is a tropical shrub native to Southeast Asia. Ophiorrhiza grandibracteolata is also notable for its ability to thrive in nutrient-poor soils, making it an important component of tropical ecosystems.
